name: Issuance of bonds for the development of infrastructure
text:
Without limiting section 201G-161, the corporation, pursuant to and in accordance with this subpart, is hereby authorized to issue bonds for the purpose of financing the development of infrastructure on land owned by the corporation. [L 1997, c 350, pt of §2]
    [Section effective July 1, 2006.  For section effective until June 30, 2006, see above.]  Without limiting section 201G-161, the administration, pursuant to and in accordance with this subpart, is hereby authorized to issue bonds for the purpose of financing the development of infrastructure on land owned by the administration. [L 1997, c 350, pt of §2; am L 2005, c 196, §26(a)]
